django.contrib.gis.serializers.geojson
======================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.serializers.geojson


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.serializers.geojson.Serializer
   django.contrib.gis.serializers.geojson.Deserializer


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Serializer

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.core.serializers.json.Serializer`


   Convert a queryset to GeoJSON, http://geojson.org/


   .. py:method:: start_serialization()

      Called when serializing of the queryset starts.



   .. py:method:: end_serialization()

      Called when serializing of the queryset ends.



   .. py:method:: start_object(obj)

      Called when serializing of an object starts.



   .. py:method:: get_dump_object(obj)


   .. py:method:: handle_field(obj, field)

      Called to handle each individual (non-relational) field on an object.



.. py:class:: Deserializer(*args, **kwargs)
